meta.description: Optimize production to meet demand with constraints on workforce and storage.

params.name: production_per_worker
params.description: Units produced per worker per month

params.name: max_extra_units_per_worker
params.description: Maximum extra units a worker can produce per month

params.name: storage_cost
params.description: Cost per unit stored per month

params.name: layoff_cost
params.description: Cost to lay off one worker

params.name: max_worker_change
params.description: Maximum change in number of workers per month

vars.name: extra_units
vars.description: Extra units produced by workers in each month

vars.name: stored_units
vars.description: Units stored at the end of each month

vars.name: hired_workers
vars.description: Number of workers hired in each month

vars.name: laid_off_workers
vars.description: Number of workers laid off in each month

vars.name: workers
vars.description: Number of workers available in each month

objective.name: max_revenue
objective.expr: sum((production_per_worker * workers[m] + extra_units[m] - demand[m]) * storage_cost - extra_units[m] * extra_unit_cost - hired_workers[m] * hiring_cost - laid_off_workers[m] * layoff_cost for m in MONTHS)
objective.description: Maximize revenue by balancing production, storage, and workforce costs
